title: NBA Draftapalooza Part 2: Picks 1-6, Paolo to Orlando, and the Kings Surprise Everyone, With Ryen Russillo, Kevin O’Connor, and Steve Ceruti
description:
The Ringer’s Bill Simmons is joined by Ryen Russillo, Kevin O’Connor, and Steve Ceruti to give their live reactions to picks 1 through 6 of the 2022 NBA draft.

Host: Bill Simmons
Guests: Ryen Russillo, Kevin O’Connor, and Steve Ceruti
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
